code: @Test public void testMarshallMessage() throws Exception {     resultEndpoint.expectedBodiesReceived(result).     template.sendBody(generateModel()).     resultEndpoint.assertIsSatisfied(). }

public List<Map<String, Object>> generateModel() {     Map<String, Object> modelObjects = new HashMap<>().     Order order = new Order().     order.setAccount("BE.CHM.001").     order.setClOrdId("CHM0001-01").     order.setIDSource("4").     order.setSecurityId("BE0001245678").     order.setSide("1").     order.setText("this is a camel - bindy test").     Calendar calendar = Calendar.getInstance(TimeZone.getTimeZone("GMT")).     // 4 hour shift     // 17-02-2011 23:29:59 by GMT-3     calendar.set(2011, 1, 18, 2, 29, 59).     order.setCreated(calendar.getTime()).     modelObjects.put(order.getClass().getName(), order).     models.add(modelObjects).     return models. }
